column1: When someone I know joins Strava
column2: When I achieve a new KOM/QOM/CR/LCL
column3: When someone takes a KOM/QOM/CR/LCL from me
column4: When I've joined, made progress on, or completed a challenge
column5: When I complete a challenge that has a reward, donation, or an opportunity to learn more
column6: When a friend invites me to join a club
column7: When someone requests to join a club of which I am an administrator
column8: When a post is added in one of my clubs
column9: When an event is added in one of my clubs
column10: When a friend invites me to join an event
column11: When it is 24 hours before one of my events
column12: When one of my events is changed or cancelled
column13: When one of my events has a new discussion
column14: When someone comments on an event discussion
column16: When someone comments on my post or replies to my comment on a post
column17: When someone kudos one of my posts
column18: When I have new friends to follow
column19: When my friends post interesting activities
column20: When I have analysis available for a recent segment effort
column21: When I upload a file that includes health data that I haven't given Strava consent to process
column22: When someone follows / requests to follow me
column24: Receive an email when someone comments on one of my activities
column25: Receive am email when someone kudos one of my activities
column27: When someone shares a Challenge with me
column28: When someone shares a Route with me
column29: When someone shares an Activity with me
column30: When someone invites me to join a Challenge
column31: When my request to join a club has been accepted
column32: When Strava would like to hear my experience and learn from me through product feedback, surveys and research
